name: cup.vim
description:
Syntax highlighting for the CUP parser generator, an LALR parser generator for JAVA. See http://www.cs.princeton.edu/~appel/modern/java/CUP/

The latest version can be found at http://www.trapdoor.org/projects/4

Patches are welcome.
install_details:
Copy cup.vim to ~/.vim/syntax and add the following line to ~/.vim/filetype.vim :

autocmd BufNewFile,BufRead *.cup setf cup
